1.content: You wake up dazed and confused. As you come to you realize where you are. You are backstage at a Girls Aloud concert. But there is one thing wrong and you soon realize it. How did you shrink? You run out of the gaping door and head for the exit. But as soon as you turn the corner you see...
1.title: What Happened?

choices: You step on something and Nicola hears it
You escape her without her hearing you
14.content: You try and sneak as quietly as possible around her. So far so good. Surely it can't be this good for you?
14.title: Passing Nicola

choices: She has sexual fantasies of what she can do to you
She wants all of the band to see what she has found
141.content: "Crunch". You never realized that tiny piece of crisp on the floor even though it was as big as your head. Nicola suddenly looked down. "Oooh what do we have here", Nicola says. "Nothing", you reply and run as fast as you can but it was no good. She scoops you up with one hand and carries you off to her dressing room.
141.title: Caught

choices: She wants to stick you somewhere
1411.content: Just what i always wanted. A little man so i can do whatever i want. "What are you going to do to me" you ask nervously. "Don't be afraid, i won't hurt you yet" she replies. She goes to her changing room and locks the door.
1411.title: Boy Toy

14112.content: You look like the ultimate toy for me but i don't know where i should stick you?
14112.title: Where will she stick you?

141121.content: "I will stick you where you have always wanted to be i'll bet", she boomed. You can't say anything as she stretches her knickers and lowers you toward her womanhood. You watch in awe as her pussy is staring straight at you. Very slowly she pushes you inside and lets go of you. Her muscular walls throb and you begin to squirm. You hear her scream for more and you oblige. But suddenly...
141121.title: A fantasy come true

1412.content:
They all come in and see you laughing.

He's amazing: says Cheryl.

He's delicious I bet, Sarah chimed it.

Nicola looks at Sarah. What? I never even though ot it.

Sarah looks at Cheryl. What do you think

Cheryl responds forcefully. YOU CAN'T EAT HIM, THATS A HUMAN BEING.

Kimberly looks at disgust at you closely then scoffs pulling back.

We dont know anything about him. He's just an ant. Squish him.

Nadine shakes her head. We can't kill him, just let him go free he'll figure it out on his own.

Cheryl looks at her mad. WE HAVE TO TAKE CARE OF HIM

the fighting continues till
1412.title: debate

141211.content: Cheryl wrestles you from Sarah's grip "He's mine now and I won't let the rest of you hurt him anymore!" as she coddled you next to her cheekbone "Fine you traitorous bitch!" Kimberly said with a sneer "We just have to take him by force from you come on girls?" as the other four singers charged at Cheryl she bolted out of the building still clinging tightly onto you and ran into her car whispering to you as she started the engine "Don't worry little man I promise I will take good care of you!" she roared out of the driveway of the studio with the others hot in pursuit but before they could even think to get in their cars or tour van you both took off down the highway by the time the four got out to the intersection it was nearly impossible to tell where Cheryl went and the four other singers gave up meanwhile Cheryl drove straight to her house and picked you up from one of the cupholders where you were hiding for the last few minutes on the road then she took you in her house locking the door behind her giving you a gentle smile "You're okay now little man I'm going to take good care of you!" with that she took you straight up to her room dropping on the bed in exhaustion she carefully looked you over with a playful glee and toyed with you for a bit with her finger gently poking your belly you wriggled and squirmed as she tickled you "Oh somebody's ticklish huh? But that's for later right now I want to have some fun with my new little friend!" she cooed but you interrupt her "What about your friends finding me here with you?" Cheryl shrugged "Don't worry about that they're not going to bother with you anymore now that I'm protecting you now for that fun time I was referring to earlier!" then to your surprise the massive Girl Aloud band member
141211.title: Cheryl

141221.content:
Sarah holds you up in front of her face.

Hmmm, you do look delicious, she says.

NO, DON'T EAT HIM, HE'S A HUMAN BEING, says Cheryl.

Too bad, hes my toy and I will do with him what i want, Sarah replies.

You are slowly lowered into her mouth. You try and resist, but you are no match for her powerful hands. She sets you on her tongue and starts to play with you in her mouth.

Hmmm, you are delicious, and its been nice knowing you, and I'm hungry, so goodbye, Sarah says.

You are slowly positioned at the back of her throat. You are coated in saliva and her throat starts to widen. And with a giant GULP, you are sent down into Sarah's stomach to become a part of her. Sarah smiles as she swallows, thinking what a great meal she made of you.
141221.title: Sarah's the winner

choices: The hungry Sarah snatches you from Kimberly
141222.content:
Nicola passes you to Kimberly and she gently takes hold. She looks at you closely, still looking disgusted.

"Look," chimes in Sarah, "I'm hungry and I really want to eat him. I none of guys are going have him, give him here!" Her stomach growled loudly as if to emphasise her request.
141222.title: Kimberly

choices: She goes and makes a sandwich
1412221.content:
"Gotcha!" exclaimed Sarah as she snatched you from Kimberly, smiling wickedly.

"Don't hurt him!" shouted Cheryl.

"Shut up." Sarah scolded. "He's mine now and and I can do what I like with him. I missed lunch and I'm starving. He'll make an excellent pre-show snack." She raised you up to her mouth, looked you in the eye and licked her lips slowly.

"It seems wrong," said Nicola, "but he does look quite tasty..."

Sarah, who was about to place you in her giant mouth, paused and glanced at Nicola. "Would you like him?" she asked.

"No, it's ok." Said Nicola. The idea of eating a little person was becoming more and more appealing to her. "You said you missed lunch, so you have him."

"Thanks." Sarah said and without hesitating placed you on her tongue. She closed her mouth and rolled you around for a few seconds. You obviously tasted good as she let out a loud "Mmmmm". Suddenly she moved you to the back of her throat and swallowed loudly. Sarah traced a line with her hand as a lump moved slowly down her throat, disappearing at her collar bone. She opened her mouth wide towards Cheryl who turned away in disgust.

"He was yummy," said Sarah, rubbing her flat stomach contentedly, "But I still feel a little hungry..."
1412221.title: Snack for Sarah

choices: One of the other girls wants to be a giantess too.
Sarah's question is met with stunned silence
14122211.content:
Sarah leant over and whispered in Nicola's ear. Nicola's eyes lit up and she began nodding, biting her lip mischeviously as she did. As Sarah moved away Nicola said "I'm in." in a hushed voice.

"Well, whatever it is, I'm definitely out." said Cheryl firmly. The other girls agreed.

"Fine." said Sarah casually and she looked over at Nicola. As she did they both began to grow. They both grew at the same rate until they were almost 100 feet tall. They filled the backstage area of the stadium they were due to perform in and both had to crouch slightly to avoid bursting though the ceiling.

All Cheryl, Kimberly and Nadine could do was stare up at their gigantic bandmates in amazment. To Sarah and Nicola they were just a few inches tall.

"Wh-what have you done?" stammered Nadine.

"Well we couldn't shrink you," explained Sarah matter-of-factly, "so we had to grow instead. I think we can have much more fun this way anyway." She smiled at Nicola. "Now, are you sure you don't want to join us?"
14122211.title: Unexpected turn of events

141222112.content:
There was silence from the three tiny girls in front of Sarah and Nicola.

"Well," Sarah said to Nicola, "looks like we've found our next course!" With that she scooped Cheryl, Nadine and Kimberly up and lifted them nearer her eye level. Nicola huddled closer as Sarah opened her hand to see the three tiny girls sat on it. "I'm rather glad you all decided to stay snack size" Sarah said, "because I was looking forward to eating you." She smiled evily. "There'll be more little people to go around when we're finished here too." Sarah licked her lips again.

"Don't I get to share?" piped Nicola "Afterall, I'm one behind you. It's only fair."

"Of course," said Sarah, though she looked a little dissappointed that she couldn't gulp down all three of the girls herself, "you're right. I have already had one little snack." She patted her belly again. "Although I can't even feel him now, he's so tiny in my giant stomach. Who would you like to eat first Nicola?"

Nicola thought for a second. "Um. I think I'd like to eat..."
141222112.title: Sharing the treats

1412221121.content:
"...Nadine. She looks delicious!" Nicola reached over and plucked the horrified Nadine from Sarah's hand. Bringing her up to her face, she looked over to Sarah, as if for guidance. "Do I just pop her in and swallow?"

"Yep." Said Sarah. "I bet she'll taste great. Enjoy!"

With that Nicola placed the struggling Nadine in her mouth and after taking a second to taste her, swallowed. Cheryl and Kimberly looked on as a tell-tale lumped moved down her throat.

"She WAS delicious!" exclaimed Nicola. "I love the way she wriggled all the way down my throat. I can still feel her moving in my belly now. I hope I don't digest her too quickly. Mmmm!"

"Who are you going to have?" she asked Sarah.
1412221121.title: Nadine

14122211212.content:
Sarah grinned wickedly and licked her lips. She looked at Nicola guiltily before raising her hand to her mouth and tossing both girls in. She closed her mouth and held them there for a second before Nicola realised what she had done.

"Hey! That's not fair!" Nicola said and both giantesses giggled. "I was really looking forward to gobbling Kimberly up."

"Sorry," Sarah managed, even though her mouth was full of her remaining bandmates, "I couldn't help myself. She rolled Cheryl and Kimberly around together gently with her teeth before casually swallowing them both. She strained slightly to get both girls into her gullet at the same time and it took the much larger bulge longer to move down her throat to the entrance of her stomach. Eventually it did and Cheryl and Kimberly plopped into Sarah's cavernous belly. As they did, Sarah belched loudly.

"I am sorry Nicola," Sarah said sheepishly, "but I was worried you might want to eat Kimberly next and that would have left me with Cheryl. She was wonderfully tasty but there isn't much meat on her. She's barely a mouthful for a hungry giantess like me!"

"That's fair enough." said Nicola "But now I'm really hungry. Where can we find some more yummy little people to eat?"
14122211212.title: Both girls end up in Sarah's belly

choices: Take a rest to digest their colossal meal
141222112121.content:
"There's 50,000 yummy little people out there silly!" Sarah said to Nicola. "Reckon you belly can handle them all?"

"Mmm! I'm willing to give it a go." Sarah said, her stomach rumbling as she rubbed it slowly.

With that Sarah burst through the wall of the backstage area onto the stage as 50,000 shocked faces took in the sight before them. Initally they thought it was part of the act and cheered and screamed loudly.

"Good evening everyone!" bellowed Sarah "We're Girls Aloud and we're HUNGRY!" She grinned wickedly. The audience still hadn't cottoned on.

"You might have noticed that a few of are missing tonight." said Nicola, "That's because we ate them." she explained matter of factly. "I've got Nadine here digesting in my stomach," she patted it for effect, "and Sarah over there scoffed Cheryl and Kimberly."

"They were delicious." Sarah added, licking her lips. "But the problem is we're huge giantesses now and we have huge giantess bellies that need filling." Her stomach growled loudly and the noise reverberated around the whole stadium. Unfortuantely a couple of little girls aren't going to satisfy our appetites so we've decided we're going to gobble all of you up as well.

The crowd realised it wasn't a joke as both giantesses lunged forward and scooped up handfuls of people. Without hesitating they raised them to their faces, almost simultaneously and stuffed them into their mouths. They watched each other as they gulped and swallowed, sending tens of people down their throats at a time.

This continued for some time as the giant girls gorged themselves. There was nowhere for the crowd to escape to so they had to accept their fate and wait their turn to be scooped up and consumed. Sometimes Sarah and Nicola played with the people and teased them before putting them in their mouths. Most of them time they just gobbled them up to satisfy their giant hungers. Sometimes they swallowed people whole, sometimes they chewed them slowly first but they both loved the feeling of their live victims wriggling inside them.

After about 30 minutes of feasting both Sarah and Nicola were begginning to feel full. There once flat bellies had swollen enormously having had several thousand people stuffed into them and they both looked like they were nine months pregnant.

Nicola stopped stuffing people into her mouth to burp loudly. Her stomach groaned and gurgled. "I'm really stuffed." she said "I think if I eat one more person I'm going to be sick."

"Me too." said Sarah. She had slowed to placing one person in her mouth at a time and slowly chewing them before carefully swallowing. Her belly also let out a series of loud and strange gurgles.

"But what are we going to do?" asked Nicola. "There are still thousands of them left and I wanted to eat every last one."

What do the greedy giantesses do next?
141222112121.title: Gorging on their fans

choices: She eats more people to grow larger (or drains Nicola to the same end)
1412221121212.content:
'Well I do have an idea' Sarah said as she began to grow again 'wait what are you doing, I thought we were in this together' Nicola asked looking at Sarah as she grew even larger. 'I've decided im going solo, I don't need you anymore' Sarah laughed at Nicola as she seemed to dwindle away 'don't think i've forgotten about all of you my yummy little snacks' she smiled down at the crowd below 'I'm still going to eat all of you as well, you're just food to me now' Sarah grunted and groaned as she arched her back against the stadium roof, slowly pushing her enormous body through 'yes im so powerful now, all those people served as fuel for my ascension to goddesshood, now the world will fall before me, everyone dedicated to worshiping me and of course as my food'. Sarah's booming laughter echoed across the city as thousands of people still trapped in the stadium below cowered beneath the new goddesses massive form, wondering when they to would be devoured. Many of them fell to their knees in prayer, hoping she would spare them, others simply hung their heads and accepted their fate.

Sarah finally stopped growing at 1500 feet 'Oh yes this more like it, this is where I belong, towering over all you little slaves' she smirked down at everything beneath her. She looked down at Nicola who was whimpering terrified at her massive former band mate 'aw whats wrong little one are you afraid of your all powerful goddess' 'please Sarah don't hurt me' 'what did you say slave' Sarah roared 'you shall address me as goddess, you are nothing to me, you will worship me, you are mine' 'I'm sorry goddess, please forgive me' Nicola wailed.

Sarah gazed around smugly 'what should I do now then'
1412221121212.title: Sarah has another plan...

choices: Will Russell be returned to normal size?
Will Russell stay a shrunken man?
15.content:
Sarah steps in front of the little shrunken man, and laughs. But the laugh is so loud to the shrunken man, that is sounds like the speaker system, when you're sitting right next to it.

Sarah picks up the shrunken man, and looks at him with a wicked smile. She begins to talk, but only in whispers, so that he can understand what she is saying.

"We have shrunk you to the size of a mouse," she whisper devilishly. "Would like to play with my kitty cat?"

The scared look on his face, begins to show fear, and she laughs again. Sarah then takes him to the dressing room, where the other girls are resting between songs, now being sung by the local band that was hired to back up the Girls Aloud group.

All of the girls looked at the little shrunken man, and began to giggle amongst themselves. They hadn't had so much fun, since their last concert two months ago.

"What, what did you do to me?" He asked hesitantly.

"Why my dear Russell, we just shrunk you, because that is the size of your pea brain. Would like to play with Sarah's kitty cat? I'm sure she would find you a very delectible meal," Nadine said with an evil look in her eye.

"But how? How did you shrink me?"

"Why my dear Russell, we're witches, and we cast a spell on you, because of your jeering at us, saying girls can't play or sing, music. So, we punished you to show you, that yes we can sing and play musical instruments. But that is our public image. Privately, we are something very different.
15.title: Russell finds out why he and how he was shrunk.

151.content:
They all start to laugh which suddenly turned into high pitched cackles. Russell starts laughing along with them.

"What are you laughing about puny mortal? Sarah asks

"Im laughing at what I would like to do to you all right now."

"YOU!! What could you possibly do to the most powerful witches on Earth?" Nadine asks.

"Well first of all you all really, really have no idea who you are dealing with." Russell says.

He does a quick spin and he was back at his normal height. The witches start casting spells and enchantments at Russell who just brushes them off with a laugh.

"Who are you?" Sarah asks in hurried breaths. "I am sure you have heard the legend of the small urchin who's father and mother were the most powerful witches in the world. You have heard how after he learned all of his parents ways that he set out on his own to find other witches and warlocks to train him. But in the end he was betrayed by the one he loved and he was killed but swore his revenge."

They all nodded and Cheryl says "But that is all legend and myth. I mean that legend is well over 5,000 years old."

"Well, the young man is back for his revenge and he will start with you all. I am taking all your powers from you and then you will be destroyed." He gives a evil laugh as he makes a weird looking stone cylinder appear out of thin air. Then he opens the lid and the girls scream as there magical powers a ripped from their bodies and flow magically into the stone cylinder. Then he closes the lid and heads to the door and opens it to reveal 3 female fans.

Russell smiles as they enter and says as he shuts the door behind him "They are all yours. As Russell heads back down the hall there was howling coming from the dressing room followed by screams of terror. He just laughs as he makes his way out of the concert.
151.title: Girls Aloud get a shocking suprise

info.brief_description: You shrink at a Girls Aloud concert. Can you make it away before 5 giantesses corner you?
info.description:
This is my first story so have fun writing about it. The main characters are:

Russell: Shrunken Guy. 18 Male.

Nadine: 20 year old with brown hair (Girls Aloud)

Nicola: 20 year old with red hair (Girls Aloud)

Kimberly: 22 year old with black hair (Girls Aloud)

Cheryl: 23 year old with brown hair (Girls Aloud)

Sarah: 22 year old with blonde hair (Girls Aloud)

You may add new characters but only females. Sorry.

This is a soft vore story.

None of Girls Aloud can shrink.
